text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Immune to Fire. Burns or thaws peas that hit it. Deals damage to all zombies close to it. Burning peas do double the damage and have splash damage.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Torchwood and Snapdragon have become friends. They hang out at either the Tiki Lounge or the Renaissance Faire.

pages.title: â›¨ Reinforce Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs.
